demos.name: Medical Image Reader and Viewer
demos.description:
This toolbox can read and write medical imaging data in dicom format with the 'readImages' function. The output of this function is a structure containing attributes of the image or volume. This structure can then be used as input into other functions in the toolbox.
This toolbox supports: - reading and writing of dicom data - mapping of volume voxel location coordinates - oblique slice alignment and registration - manual 3D image rotation - coregistered image viewing supports PET/CT and PET/MR
Syntax: CT = readImages([CT_ImageDirectoryPath]); PET = readImages([PET_ImageDirectoryPath]); VolumeViewer3D(CT,PET) VolumeViewer3D(CT,PET,'align','trim')
This has only been tested on data originating from Siemens Biograph mCT and mMR scanners.
